extendedInfo.description: Course to Steer, the sailing app which calculates your course to steer to compensate for tide, wind and magnetic compass errors.Check your chart-work before sailing by tapping into the app your intended ground track (or course to make good) along with your boat speed plus the set and rate of tidal stream. Your course to steer and speed over the ground are calculated instantly.Enter magnetic variation and deviation and your course to steer is converted from True to Magnetic to Compass bearing.Correct for Leeway, simply enter the wind direction and the course to steer will be corrected to counteract the wind.

reviews.title: Must have for tidal sailing
reviews.comment: Very useful app. The gives the same result as if you put the tide vector on paper chart but much quicker and easier (on moving boat).
reviews.author: Alexey R

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This is an extremely useful app for all long haul boaters. Or even just to learn more about boating
reviews.author: Dylan Clark

reviews.comment: Does what it says and it\'s free! Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User
